TEXT.English: The Power of Philosophy:
Positive health contributes to city growth during the Ancient era
TEXT.Chinese: 正的健康有助于上古时代城市的发展

TEXT.English: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Bribe Barbarians[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Allows your spy to offer gold to bribe one barbarian unit on this plot to join your army.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]贿赂野蛮人[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]允许你的间谍提供黄金贿赂这个阴谋上的一个野蛮人单位加入你的军队。

TEXT.English: Frightened by the approaching Mongol armies, the citizens of %s1 have abandoned their defenses!
TEXT.Chinese: 由于受到即将到来的蒙古军队的惊吓，%s1的市民放弃了他们的防御！

TEXT.English: The citizens of %s1 tremble in fear before our approaching armies!
TEXT.Chinese: 在我们即将到来的军队面前，%s1的市民在恐惧中颤抖！

TEXT.English: Receives a free technology for the first five technologies discovered
TEXT.Chinese: 获得发现的前五项技术的免费技术

TEXT.English: The Power of Horsemanship
Cities keep an additional 25% [ICON_FOOD] after growing
TEXT.Chinese: 城市在增长后还保留了25%的[ICON_FOOD]

TEXT.English: The Power of Devshirme:
The Power of the Pharaoh:
The Power of Bribery:
The Power of the American Dream:
The Power of Multiculturalism:
The Power of Orda:
Naval units can establish embassies. Embassies provide 2 [ICON_GOLD] in your capital
TEXT.Chinese: 海军部队可以建立大使馆。大使馆在您的首都提供2个 [ICON_GOLD]

TEXT.English: The Romans have fielded an army to conquer our civilization!
TEXT.Chinese: 罗马人已经派出军队来征服我们的文明！

TEXT.English: The Power of Satrapy:
The Power of Sanitation:
[ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change%F2_HappyOrUn In All Cities
Ocean Trade allowed with Cartography, reduced instability for overseas colonies
TEXT.Chinese: 获得制图学后允许海洋贸易，减少了海外殖民地的不稳定性

TEXT.English: The Power of Nobel Prizes:
The Power of Monsoons:
Can always hurry units with gold and pays half the cost and no extra upkeep for hurried units
TEXT.Chinese: 可以随时用黄金催促单位，并只需支付相比原来一半的费用，且对于被催促的单位没有额外的维护费

TEXT.English: The Power of Terraces:
The Power of Education:
[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Establish Embassy[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Provides 2[ICON_GOLD] in your capital. Cannot lose contact with this civ.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]在您的首都建立大使馆[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]提供2个[ICON_GOLD]。不能失去与这个文明的联系。

TEXT.English: Our population in %s1 is growing due to Jewish immigrants from less tolerant nations!
TEXT.Chinese: 我们在 %s1 的人口正在增长，这是因为犹太移民来自不太宽容的国家！

TEXT.English: Double construction speed of state religion buildings
TEXT.Chinese: 国教建筑建造速率加倍

TEXT.English: Melee units do not require strategic resources
TEXT.Chinese: 近战单位不需要战略资源

TEXT.English: The Power of Flower Wars:
Free specialist in all of your cities until the Industrial Age
TEXT.Chinese: 在你们所有的城市都有免费的专家，直到工业时代

TEXT.English: Double specialist slots in capital
Tolerance is enabled at the start. Immigration from Jewish cities. Victories against Barbarians contribute to Great General births.
TEXT.Chinese: 游戏开始启用宗教宽容，从犹太城市获得移民，与野蛮人的战斗计入大将军点数。 ’

TEXT.English: The Tamils have fielded an army to conquer our civilization!
TEXT.Chinese: 泰米尔人派出了一支军队来征服我们的文明！

TEXT.English: Can Conscript two extra Units in Cities with Non-State Religions
TEXT.Chinese: 在有非国家宗教信仰的城市能多征募两个单位

TEXT.English: 25% of [ICON_COMMERCE] from trade routes is converted to [ICON_FOOD]
TEXT.Chinese: 来自贸易路线的[ICON_COMMERCE]的25%转化为[ICON_FOOD]

TEXT.English: The Greeks have fielded an army to conquer our civilization!
TEXT.Chinese: 希腊人派出了一支军队来征服我们的文明！

TEXT.English: %s1 (%d2 gold)
Doubled yield and commerce from the trading company corporation
TEXT.Chinese: 成倍的收益和贸易公司的贸易

TEXT.English: Extra food, production and commerce in your capital from Jewish cities with open borders; immigration from Jewish cities at war
TEXT.Chinese: 从边界开放的犹太城市到你们首都的额外食品、生产和贸易；从战争中的犹太城市移民

TEXT.English: The Power of Stone Cities:
Sugar counts as oil for Oil Industry
TEXT.Chinese: 糖可以作为石油工业的原料

TEXT.English: Units in cities, wooded plots and on hills have 2 first extra strikes
TEXT.Chinese: 城市、树林和山丘上的单位有2次额外的攻击

TEXT.English: The Power of Madaris:
The Power of Purity:
Improvements that yield food give one extra food on plains tiles until the Renaissance
TEXT.Chinese: 在文艺复兴之前，在平原地块上增加一点食物产出

TEXT.English: The Power of the Cradle of Civilization:
All land units can move through jungles and rainforests, can build farms on rainforest
TEXT.Chinese: 所有的陆地单位都可以穿过丛林和雨林，可以在雨林上建农场

TEXT.English: The Power of Wealth:
Double gold value in trades, spies can bribe barbarian units
TEXT.Chinese: 交易中的双倍黄金价值，间谍可以贿赂野蛮人单位

TEXT.English: An army has been fielded to attack %s1_civ_adjective!
+1 Commerce per Excess Happiness
The Power of Voortrekkers:
The Power of Juntas:
Core Cities also yield a Farm's base yields.
TEXT.Chinese: 核心城市也产生了农场的基本产量。

TEXT.English: The Power of Embassies:
The Power of Aliyah:
Settled Great People create two extra [ICON_HAPPY] and one extra [ICON_GOLD]
TEXT.Chinese: 定居的伟人创造了两个额外的[ICON_HAPPY]和一个额外的[ICON_GOLD]

TEXT.English: The Power of Exploration:
Additional gold from the spread of the spice route.
TEXT.Chinese: 从外国船只通过你核心的额外黄金

TEXT.English: %s1 has fielded an army to conquer our civilization!
TEXT.Chinese: %s1派了一支军队去征服我们的文明！

TEXT.English: The Power of Thalassocracy:
The Power of Indirect Rule:
Religious buildings produce +2 [ICON_CULTURE] and +2 [ICON_RESEARCH]
The Power of the Tropics:
Choose the barbarian unit you wish to bribe:
TEXT.Chinese: 选择你想贿赂的野蛮人单位：

TEXT.English: Barbarians cannot enter your territory during peacetime and mounted barbarians will join your armies if attacked during wartime
TEXT.Chinese: 野蛮人在和平时期不能进入你的领土，如果在战争期间受到攻击，骑在马上的野蛮人将加入你的军队

TEXT.English: The Power of Myriads:
Cities have a trade connection to all other cities with your state religion
TEXT.Chinese: 城市与你国宗教的所有其他城市都有贸易联系

TEXT.English: Extra production and commerce on city tiles
TEXT.Chinese: 城市地块的额外生产和商业

TEXT.English: The Power of Golden Liberty:
Buildings that already exist in your capital receive +30% construction speed.
TEXT.Chinese: 在你的首都已经存在的建筑将获得+30%的建造速度。

TEXT.English: The Power of Chernozem Soil
Religious buildings provide +1 [ICON_GREATPEOPLE]
The Power of Navigation:
The Power of Obsidian:
Enemy units in Russia take damage every turn
TEXT.Chinese: 在俄罗斯的敌军每回合都受到伤害

TEXT.English: Additional stability for recently conquered cities
TEXT.Chinese: 新征服城市的额外稳定性

TEXT.English: Mounted units recieve defensive bonuses
TEXT.Chinese: 骑兵单位获得防御加成

TEXT.English: Your triumphant victories have enabled you to field another legion!
TEXT.Chinese: 你的胜利使你能发动另一个军团！

TEXT.English: The Jewish population of %s1 is fleeing to Israel!
TEXT.Chinese: %s1 的犹太人正在逃往以色列！

TEXT.English: The Jewish population of %s1 is emigrating to the Jewish Kingdom!
TEXT.Chinese: %s1 的犹太人正在移民到犹太王国！

TEXT.English: Additional food and commerce during Golden Ages
TEXT.Chinese: 黄金时期的额外食品和商业

TEXT.English: The Power of General Winter:
Additional gold from pillaging, sacking cities and sinking ships during the Middle Ages
TEXT.Chinese: 中世纪掠夺、洗劫城市和击沉船只带来额外黄金

TEXT.English: Cities receive half the construction cost as culture after a building is completed
TEXT.Chinese: 一座建筑完成之后，建造它的一半产能将会转为文化。

TEXT.English: Additional happiness from running Democracy, Constitution, Individualism and Free Enterprise
TEXT.Chinese: 民主制度、宪法制度、个人主义和自由市场政体带来额外幸福

TEXT.English: Units retain all their experience when upgraded
TEXT.Chinese: 单位升级后保留所有经验

TEXT.English: The Power of Mercenaries:
The Power of the Shield of the Warrior King:
The Power of Safaviyya:
Naval units receive +2 movement points
The Power of Vaults:
The Power of Investiture:
The Power of Spices:
Additional infrastructure in new and acquired cities
TEXT.Chinese: 新城市的额外基础设施

TEXT.English: The Power of Missionaries:
The Power of Infrastructure:
The Power of Sea Trade:
The Power of Monks Kings:
None
+2 [ICON_RESEARCH] to science buildings
Cities receive additional food whenever a technology is discovered before the Middle Ages
TEXT.Chinese: 在中世纪以前，只要一项科技被发现，城市就会得到额外的食物

TEXT.English: State religion spreads with temples to conquered cities
TEXT.Chinese: 被征服的城市自动传播国教并建立寺庙

TEXT.English: Immigrants bring [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] to your cities
TEXT.Chinese: 移民把 [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] 带到你的城市

TEXT.English: The Power of Ethanol:
After discovering all medieval techs, every tech three other civilizations are willing to trade costs -50% [ICON_RESEARCH]
TEXT.Chinese: 在发现了所有中世纪的技术之后，其他三个文明的每一项技术都愿意以50%的成本进行交易[ICON_RESEARCH]

TEXT.English: Faraway Cities incur no extra Maintenance
TEXT.Chinese: 遥远的城市不需要额外的维护

TEXT.English: Extra [ICON_PRODUCTION], [ICON_COMMERCE], and can build farms on desert
TEXT.Chinese: 额外[ICON_PRODUCTION], [ICON_COMMERCE], 可以在沙漠上种田

TEXT.English: The Jewish population of %s1 is fleeing %s2 and performing their Aliyah to %s3!
TEXT.Chinese: %s1 的犹太人正在逃离 %s2 并向 %s3 表演他们的阿里亚！

TEXT.English: The Power of Aquifiers:
The Power of Aflaj:
The Power of Guerilla Warfare:
Citizens of
Diplomatic penalties expire faster, more likely to be voted for in congresses
TEXT.Chinese: 外交惩罚到期更快，更有可能在国际会议被投票支持

TEXT.English: Monarchy, Redistribution and Deification are enabled at start
TEXT.Chinese: 君主制、再分配和神化在一开始就被启用了

TEXT.English: The Power of Discovery:
The Power of Arid Agriculture:
The Power of Father Governs Children:
The Power of Mining Industry:
+50% [ICON_PRODUCTION] of ancient era buildings in cities with Stone
TEXT.Chinese: +50% [ICON_PRODUCTION] 如果城市有远古石头建筑

TEXT.English: Improved resources adjacent to cities provide additional food and production
TEXT.Chinese: 城市附近资源的改善提供了额外的食物和生产

TEXT.English: The Power of Prosperity:
+150% Great People birth rate until the end of the Classical Era
TEXT.Chinese: +150%的伟人出生率直到古典时代结束

TEXT.English: Can build farms on hills
The Power of Tolerance:
The Power of Straits:
Your successful conquests have made your horde grow!
TEXT.Chinese: 你成功的征服使你的部落壮大了！

TEXT.English: One extra [ICON_HEALTHY] for every three excess [ICON_HAPPY]
TEXT.Chinese: 增加一个 [ICON_HEALTHY] 每多三个 [ICON_HAPPY]

TEXT.English: +1 commerce in every land plot
The Power of Faith:
Mines on the mining resources provide doubled [ICON_PRODUCTION] and [ICON_COMMERCE] increment.
TEXT.Chinese: 采矿资源上的矿山提供了两倍的[ICON_PRODUCTION]和[ICON_COMMERCE]增量。

TEXT.English: The Power of Terror:
The Power of Trading Companies:
Mountains produce 2 food and 1 hammer
TEXT.Chinese: 山峰提供2食物和1锤子产出

TEXT.English: The Power of Renaissance:
The Power of the Liberator:
Bribing Barbarians
Immigrants coming to our city of %s1 have brought it %d3 points closer to generating a %s2.
TEXT.Chinese: 来到我们的%s1城市的移民使它的%d3点更接近生成%s2

TEXT.English: The Power of Irrigation:
The Power of Raids:
The Power of Architecture:
The Power of Diplomacy:
The Power of Communion:
Foreign trade route yields increased by 100%
Jungles, rainforests and marshes yield extra food and production and cause no unhealthiness
TEXT.Chinese: 丛林、雨林和沼泽产生额外的食物和产能，且不会造成不健康

TEXT.English: Our population in %s1 is growing due to immigrants from the Old World!
TEXT.Chinese: 由于来自旧大陆的移民，我们在%s1的人口正在增长！

TEXT.English: The Power of the Long Count:
Cities threatened by your armies descend into unrest
TEXT.Chinese: 受你军队威胁的城市陷入动乱

TEXT.English: Fortified units can get up to 50% defense bonus
TEXT.Chinese: 强化单位可以获得50%的防御加成

TEXT.English: Cities partially continue to grow when using Food for Production
TEXT.Chinese: 在利用粮食生产的情况下，城市在一定程度上继续增长

TEXT.English: Can train unlimited missionaries; Missionaries can enter foreign territory
TEXT.Chinese: 可以训练无限的传教士；传教士可以进入外国领土

TEXT.English: Military units can enslave defeated enemy units, can sacrifice slaves to increase city happiness
TEXT.Chinese: 军队可以奴役战败的敌军，可以牺牲奴隶来增加城市的幸福感

TEXT.English: No penalties for cultural expansion over Ocean tiles
TEXT.Chinese: 海洋地块上文化扩张更容易

TEXT.English: The Power of Doctrine:
fear the same fate of their neighbour inhabitants and surrender!
TEXT.Chinese: 害怕遭受到和邻居一样的命运，投降吧！

TEXT.English: Extra commerce on coast and ocean tiles
TEXT.Chinese: 沿海和海洋地块带来额外贸易

TEXT.English: Great Generals can start Golden Ages
TEXT.Chinese: 伟大的将军可以开启黄金时代

TEXT.English: No City Resistance on Conquest in Latin America
TEXT.Chinese: 拉丁美洲没有城市反抗你的征服

TEXT.English: The Power of Modernization:
